name: com.holoi.xr.holokit
description:
Provides stereoscopic rendering and several Apple native integrations for development of Unity projects on HoloKit.

Includes the following features:
-Stereoscopic Rendering
-Apple Vision Hand Tracking
-Lite Hand Tracking using Human Segmentation
-NFC Authentication

HoloKit SDK is compatible with ARFoundation.

samples.description: Contains sample code on how to setup stereoscopic rendering
Contains sample code on how to setup Apple Vision hand tracking (this algorithm is extremyly energy consuming and not recommended for long time usage)
Contains sample code on how to setup an alternative low energy comsuming but less precise hand tracking algorithm
